A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Defiantly Not for everyone. Only star wars fans hate star wars this much. Messes with some aspects of the lore but overall it shuts down the unnecessary speculation\, don't get me wrong I love speculation but it's only because you build it up to be such a great twist that your disappointed. We knew nothing of the Emperor in the original films and everyone let's that slide. episode 4 and 5 were fresh new ideas and things never seen before and now that someone tried to continue with new ideas he gets crussified.
